Title: Manastorm Mystique
Description:
The Manastorms are... unique. 

While their romance can be explosive, the spark that fanned that flame was quite small. Oddly, Millhouse is having an uncharacteristic crisis of confidence. 

We need you to help bring them together. May the titans have mercy on us all...
ObjectivesText: Talk to Millhouse Manastorm in Dalaran.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Soridormi in the Everywhere Inn.

Objectives.Text: Take the portal from Everywhen Inn to Dalaran
Return to Chromie in Everywhen Inn
Take the portal from Dalaran to Everywhen Inn
